Text: This is Disc 2/DVD of "Tributo A La Cumbia Colombiana.
Well, so much for being Anonymous... ;)

To play this DVD you need to download VLC player (http://www.videolan.org/vlc/download-windows.html), then right click the "Tributo A La Cumbia Colomiana" FOLDER and select "Play with VLC media player". It's a full DVD-RIP so it'll have a start menu.
